Question: Endava CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Endava CES 2024

- Revenue: GBP188.4 million, 0.6% decrease in constant currency
- Profit before tax: GBP17.3 million
- Adjusted profit before tax: GBP29.8 million, 15.8% margin
- Adjusted diluted earnings per share: GBP0.39
- Client revenue concentration: 35% from top 10 clients
- Geographic revenue split: North America 30%, Europe 25%, UK 35%, Rest of World 10%
- Vertical revenue split: Payments 27%, BCM 14%, Insurance 8%, TMT 23%, Mobility 11%, Other 17%
- Employee count: 11,761
- Wellbeing initiatives: "One Endava" leadership program and EcoVadis Silver Medal
- Revenue trends: Decline in North America (-15.6%) and UK (-16.0%), growth in Europe (8.8%) and Rest of World (180.2%)
- Vertical revenue trends: Decline in Payments (-14.7%) and BCM (-14.4%), growth in Insurance (32.3%), Mobility (6.7%), and Other (4.7%)
- Adjusted free cash flow: GBP16.0 million
Summary_cn:
Endava CES 2024

- 收入: 1.884亿英镑，按恒定货币计算减少了0.6%
- 税前利润: 1730万英镑
- 调整后税前利润: 2980万英镑，利润率为15.8%
- 调整后稀释每股收益: 0.39英镑
- 客户收入集中度: 前10名客户占35%
- 地理收入分布: 北美30%，欧洲25%，英国35%，世界其他地区10%
- 垂直收入分布: 支付27%，商务通信及媒体行业14%，保险行业8%，电信、媒体和技术行业23%，移动行业11%，其他17%
- 员工人数: 11,761人
- 健康福利项目: “One Endava”领导力计划和EcoVadis银牌奖
- 收入趋势: 北美 (-15.6%) 和英国 (-16.0%)下降，欧洲增长 (8.8%) 和世界其他地区增长 (180.2%)
- 垂直收入趋势: 支付 (-14.7%) 和商务通信及媒体行业 (-14.4%)下降，保险行业增长 (32.3%)，移动行业 (6.7%) 和其他行业 (4.7%)
- 调整后自由现金流: 1600万英镑
